title: Premium Composite Kit
longDescription: The Premium Composite Kit represents the latest advancement in dental restorative materials. Designed specifically for modern dental practices, this kit delivers exceptional aesthetic results with its comprehensive shade selection and advanced composite technology. The material offers superior durability, excellent polishability, and natural-looking restorations that blend seamlessly with natural dentition.
alt: dental composite resin kit, restorative material, dental filling materials

certifications.title: FDA Approved
certifications.description: This product is FDA cleared for dental restorative applications.

certifications.title: CE Marking
certifications.description: Complies with European health and safety standards.

paragraphs: The Premium Composite Kit represents the latest advancement in dental restorative materials. Designed specifically for modern dental practices, this kit delivers exceptional aesthetic results with its comprehensive shade selection and advanced composite technology.

The nano-hybrid composite formula provides superior durability and excellent polishability, making it ideal for both anterior and posterior restorations. The material offers natural-looking results that blend seamlessly with natural dentition.

With easy application and consistent handling properties, the Premium Composite Kit streamlines your workflow while delivering predictable, high-quality results. The comprehensive shade selection ensures perfect color matching for every patient.
benefits: Superior aesthetic results with natural-looking restorations
Comprehensive shade selection for perfect color matching

installationNote.title: Training & Support
installationNote.text: Free training and technical support are available for orders over $500. Our certified specialists will provide comprehensive guidance on product usage and best practices.

reviews.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Easy to Use
reviews.text: We've been using this composite kit for about 6 months now, and it has completely transformed our restorative work. The shade selection is comprehensive, and the material handles beautifully. Patients love the natural-looking results.

reviews.author: Dr. Michael Chen
reviews.title: Great Value for Premium Quality
reviews.text: After comparing several composite systems, we chose this kit based on quality and price point. The material is easy to work with, polishes beautifully, and the results are consistently excellent. Highly recommended.

questions.question: What shades are included in the kit?

answer.author: Product Specialist
answer.text: The Premium Composite Kit includes 20+ shades covering the full Vita Classic shade range, plus additional bleached and translucent shades for optimal color matching.

questions.question: How long is the working time?

answer.author: Technical Support
answer.text: The working time is approximately 2-3 minutes, providing ample time for placement and contouring before curing.

title: ProVision HD Intraoral Camera
longDescription: The ProVision HD Intraoral Camera represents the latest advancement in dental imaging technology. Designed specifically for modern dental practices, this camera delivers exceptional image quality with its 2MP HD resolution and advanced CMOS sensor technology. The integrated LED illumination system provides consistent, shadow-free lighting for accurate color reproduction and detailed visualization of oral structures.
alt: digital intraoral camera, dental imaging device, handheld dental camera

certifications.title: FDA Approved
certifications.description: This device is FDA 510(k) cleared for intraoral imaging and patient documentation in dental practices.

certifications.title: CE Marking
certifications.description: Complies with European health, safety, and environmental protection standards.

certifications.title: HIPAA Compliant
certifications.description: Software includes encryption and security features to protect patient data and ensure HIPAA compliance.

paragraphs: The ProVision HD Intraoral Camera represents the latest advancement in dental imaging technology. Designed specifically for modern dental practices, this camera delivers exceptional image quality with its 2MP HD resolution and advanced CMOS sensor technology.

The integrated LED illumination system provides consistent, shadow-free lighting for accurate color reproduction and detailed visualization of oral structures. The auto-focus technology ensures sharp images at various distances, making it ideal for both close-up detail work and broader oral cavity documentation.

With both USB and wireless connectivity options, the ProVision HD integrates seamlessly with existing practice management software and imaging systems. The lightweight, ergonomic design reduces hand fatigue during extended use, while the durable construction ensures reliable performance in busy clinical environments.
benefits: Enhanced patient communication through high-quality visuals
Improved treatment planning with detailed documentation
Reduced chair time with instant image capture

installationNote.title: Installation & Training
installationNote.text: Free installation and training services are available for orders over $1,500. Our certified technicians will ensure proper setup and provide comprehensive training for your team.

reviews.author: Dr. Michael Chen
reviews.title: Exceptional Image Quality and Easy Integration
reviews.text: We've been using the ProVision HD for about 3 months now, and it has completely transformed our patient consultations. The image quality is outstanding - the clarity and color accuracy help patients understand their treatment needs much better. The wireless connectivity works flawlessly with our practice management software.

reviews.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
reviews.title: Great Value and Excellent Support
reviews.text: After comparing several intraoral cameras, we chose the ProVision HD based on the feature set and price point. The installation was seamless, and the training provided was comprehensive. Our staff adapted quickly, and patients love seeing the detailed images of their teeth. Highly recommended for any practice looking to upgrade their imaging capabilities.

reviews.author: Dr. James Wilson
reviews.title: Solid Performance with Room for Improvement
reviews.text: The ProVision HD delivers good image quality and the build feels solid. The auto-focus works well in most situations, though occasionally it struggles in very tight spaces. The software integration was straightforward. Overall, it's a reliable camera that meets our daily needs, though the price point could be more competitive.

questions.question: Is this camera compatible with Mac computers?

answer.author: DentyPro Support Team
answer.text: Yes, the ProVision HD is fully compatible with both Mac and Windows systems. The included software supports macOS 10.15 and later versions. We also provide free technical support for Mac setup and integration with popular dental practice management software on Mac platforms.

questions.question: What's the difference between this model and the ProVision Standard?

answer.author: Product Specialist
answer.text: The ProVision HD offers several key upgrades over the Standard model:

questions.question: How long does the warranty cover repairs and replacements?

answer.author: Customer Service
answer.text: The standard warranty covers 2 years from purchase date, including parts and labor. During this period, we provide free repairs or replacement if needed. Extended warranty options are available for up to 4 years total coverage. All warranty service includes free shipping both ways.

title: Surgical Instrument Set
longDescription: The Surgical Instrument Set represents professional-grade dental surgical instruments designed for precision and durability. This comprehensive 15-piece kit includes all essential instruments needed for dental extractions and surgical procedures. Each instrument is crafted from high-grade stainless steel and undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure optimal performance and longevity.
alt: dental surgical instruments set, stainless steel tools, dental extraction kit

certifications.title: ISO 13485 Certified
certifications.description: Manufactured in ISO 13485 certified facility ensuring highest quality standards.

certifications.title: CE Marking
certifications.description: Complies with European medical device regulations.

warrantyOptions.title: Standard Warranty (Lifetime)
warrantyOptions.description: Included - Lifetime warranty on materials and workmanship

paragraphs: The Surgical Instrument Set represents professional-grade dental surgical instruments designed for precision and durability. This comprehensive 15-piece kit includes all essential instruments needed for dental extractions and surgical procedures.

Each instrument is crafted from high-grade 316L stainless steel and undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure optimal performance and longevity. The mirror polish finish provides smooth operation and easy cleaning, while the autoclave-safe construction ensures reliable sterilization.
The set includes elevators, forceps, periosteal elevators, and other essential surgical instruments, all designed with ergonomic handles for comfortable use during extended procedures.
benefits: Lifetime warranty on materials and workmanship

installationNote.title: Care & Maintenance
installationNote.text: All instruments are autoclave safe. Proper cleaning and sterilization procedures are included in the care instructions. Lifetime warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship.

reviews.author: Dr. Amanda Foster
reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Precision
reviews.text: These instruments are top-notch. The quality of the stainless steel is excellent, and they feel perfectly balanced in hand. We've been using them for over a year now with no signs of wear. The lifetime warranty gives us confidence in our investment.

answer.author: Product Specialist
answer.text: Yes, all instruments in this set are made from 316L stainless steel and are fully autoclave safe. They can withstand standard autoclave sterilization cycles without damage.

title: Metal Bracket System
longDescription: The Metal Bracket System features advanced self-ligating technology that reduces friction and enables more efficient tooth movement. These precision-engineered brackets offer superior torque control and are designed to minimize treatment time while maximizing patient comfort.
alt: orthodontic brackets, metal braces, dental orthodontic supplies

certifications.title: CE Marking
certifications.description: Complies with European medical device standards.

paragraphs: The Metal Bracket System features advanced self-ligating technology that reduces friction and enables more efficient tooth movement. These precision-engineered brackets offer superior torque control and are designed to minimize treatment time while maximizing patient comfort.

The self-ligating mechanism eliminates the need for elastic or metal ligatures, reducing friction and allowing for more predictable tooth movement. This technology has been shown to reduce overall treatment time while maintaining excellent clinical outcomes.

The brackets are manufactured from high-grade stainless steel and feature a low-profile design that enhances patient comfort. The precise torque values ensure predictable tooth movement and optimal treatment results.
benefits: Reduced treatment time with self-ligating technology
Superior torque control for predictable results
Enhanced patient comfort with low-profile design
Reduced friction for more efficient tooth movement

installationNote.title: Training Available
installationNote.text: Free training and technical support are available for orders over $500. Our orthodontic specialists will provide comprehensive guidance on bracket placement and treatment protocols.

reviews.author: Dr. Robert Kim
reviews.title: Excellent Self-Ligating System
reviews.text: We've been using this bracket system for about 8 months now, and the results have been excellent. The self-ligating mechanism works smoothly, and we've noticed a reduction in treatment time. Patients appreciate the low-profile design.

questions.question: How many brackets are included in one set?

answer.author: Product Specialist
answer.text: Each set includes 100 brackets, which is typically sufficient for one full arch treatment.
